name: Trim & Cut
text: Avada Barbers are experts in the lickety split trim and hair cut. Quick but careful and ridiculously good loking.

name: Wash & Dry
text: Take a seat in our fine leather chairs, lean back and let us lather you a fresg head in a luxurious fashion.

name: Beard Tidy
text: Tame the angles and untidy facial hairs like a gentleman with our Beard Tidy services from Avada Barbers.
